title: Extravagant Paris
details:
Day-1: Visit the national art museum of Paris: Louvre Museum 
 Day-2: Visit the most famous tourist attraction in Paris: The Eiffel Tower 
 Day-3: Take a trip to the adventorous DisneyLand in Paris 
 Day-4: Take the Paris city tour.

title: Beautiful Paris
details:
Day-1: Visit the national art museum of Paris: Louvre Museum and the most famous tourist attraction in Paris: The Eiffel Tower 
 Day-4: Take the Paris city tour.

title: Modern Tokyo
details:
Day-1: Visit the famous skyscrappers in Tokyo: Tokyo Skytree and Tokyo Tower 
 Day-2: Take the Tokyo City tour

title: Dashing Dubai
details:
Day-1: Visit the Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa with light show 
 Day-2: Take the desert Safari 
 Day-3: Visit the Gold market and shopping markets of Dubai 
 Day-4: Visit the famous Palm Island and Burj-Al-Arab

title: Scintilating Singapore
details:
Day-1: Visit the Singapore Flyer with Gardens by the Bay 
 Day-2: Visit the Sentossa Island 
 Day-3: Take the Singapore City Tour

title: Splendid Singapore
details:
